channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: An average of 2,660 patients per day were in hospital with flu in England last week – the highest ever for this time of year. #Flu #England #Health #NHS #BBCNews

item.title: US forces have seized an oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela, in a sharp escalation of Washington's pressure campaign against the country's government. The country is home to some the world's largest proven oil reserves. #Venezuela #SouthAmerica #Nicolá

item.title: The footage of killer whales and Pacific white-sided dolphins near the coast of British Columbia, Canada, is the first recorded evidence of the two species working together, researchers said. #Whales #Dolphins #BritishColumbia #Canada #Sealife #BBCNews

item.title: A BBC investigation into Chinese disciplinary schools found more than 20 former students claiming there was physical punishment. Other survivors say the schools colluded with parents to abduct them, forcing them into military-style training to ‘fix’ them
